channel.title: LSE:SFOR on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in LSE:SFOR on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Sorrell’s S4 Capital Receives Merger Approaches, Sky Says
item.description: S4 Capital Plc, the media group founded by British businessman Martin Sorrell, has received approaches from suitors in recent weeks over a potential tie-up, Sky News reported Saturday.
